Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageName.markdownDescription:
The name of the image.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]([-.]?[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.
ImageArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:image\/[a-zA-Z0-9]([-.]?[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that enables Amazon SageMaker to perform tasks on behalf of the customer.
ImageRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that enables Amazon SageMaker to perform tasks on behalf of the customer.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageDisplayName.description: The display name of the image.
ImageDisplayName.markdownDescription:
The display name of the image.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9 -_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ImageDescription.markdownDescription:
A description of the image.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: .+  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption
